meanings.sent1: She was uneager to try the new food.
meanings.sent2: The students were uneager to start their homework.
meanings.sent3: He was uneager to jump into the cold pool.
meanings.sent4: The cat was uneager to leave its cozy spot by the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The uneager audience barely clapped after the performance.

meanings.sent1: The uneager puppy slowly followed its owner.
